name: CLIP-seq Toolkit
body:
# Repository Purpose

CLIP-seq can globally report all the binding positions of RNA binding proteins, like PTB, FOX, etc. The key is to identify the sites where proteins and RNA are bound with high affinity and strength, a.k.a peak finding. Chip-seq can do the same to DNA binding protein, thus
